about_the_game:
With the iB Cricket Companion app, those playing iB Cricket in standalone Quest2/Quest headsets can access local PvP right from their desktop. You can bowl to your friend from this companion app and your friend can bat in VR in iB Cricket. Also, you can checkout the live matches and have fun.

Bowl to your friends

  • Choose the stadium, pitch, country jersey, day/night/overcast conditions, bowling level etc. right from your desktop and start the PvP match.
  • Select the fieldset, pick special balls, and set the line & length to bowl. Have fun challenging your friends.

    iBTV

  • Check out live matches and have fun watching them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620m, AMD Radeon HD 6450 equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 64 bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
